com.ephesoft.gxt.core.server.security.service.impl

Class AbstractEphesoftAuthorizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ephesoft.gxt.core.server.security.service.impl.AbstractEphesoftAuthorizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuthorizationService
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicAuthorizer, SSOAuthorizer

    public abstract class AbstractEphesoftAuthorizer
extends java.lang.Object
implements AuthorizationService
    Provides implementation of AuthorizationService common in case where authorisation is configured with Ephesoft.
    Version:
    1.0 $LastChangedDate:$
    $LastChangedRevision:$
    Author:
    Ephesoft created on 18-Nov-2013
